title: Baked Beans
ingredients: 1 lb dried navy beans, soaked overnight
8 oz salt pork or bacon, diced
steps: Drain soaked beans. Cover with fresh water by 2 inches.
Simmer until just tender, 45 min to 1 hour. Drain, reserve 2 cups liquid.
Cook salt pork until fat renders. Add onion, cook until soft.
Stir in molasses, sugar, mustard, vinegar, reserved liquid.
